revised_title: A Unified Approach to the Periodic Solution of the Burgers Equation
tldr: The author presents a unified approach to the periodic solution of the Burgers equation using the Hopf-Cole transformation and Riemann theta functions. This approach unifies various known expressions for the periodic solution and provides a new expression in the form of a modulated sine wave. The author also discusses the similarities between the Burgers equation and other nonlinear wave equations, such as the Korteweg-de Vries equation.
